titleEn: Copyright Board of Canada - Proposed Tariff Filing Form
titleFr: [fr] Copyright Board of Canada - Proposed Tariff Filing Form

confirmation.descriptionEn:
# Thank you for your tariff. 
 The Proposed Tariff(s) has/have been successfully filed. The Board will inform you when this proposed tariff has/have been published on the Board’s website or if we require additional information. 
 [Go Back](https://cb-cda.gc.ca/en)
confirmation.descriptionFr:
# Merci pour votre entrée. 
 The Proposed Tariff(s) has/have been successfully filed. The Board will inform you when this proposed tariff has/have been published on the Board’s website or if we require additional information. 
 [Go Back](https://cb-cda.gc.ca/en)

properties.descriptionEn: Find out how the Copyright Board of Canada protects you [privacy](https://cb-cda.gc.ca/en/terms-and-conditions).
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] Find out how Copyright Board of Canada protects you [privacy](https://cb-cda.gc.ca/en/terms-and-conditions).

properties.descriptionEn: If you are filing a joint tariff, please add the other collective(s). You can add another collective society, up to ten, by clicking 'add row' below.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] - If you are filing a joint tariff, please add the other collective(s). You can add another collective society, up to ten, by clicking 'add row' below.

choices.fr: Agences des droits des radiodiffuseurs canadiens
Société de perception de droit d’auteur du Canada
Agence canadienne des droits de reproduction musicaux
Société canadienne de perception de la copie privée
Société collective de retransmission du Canada
Association du droit de retransmission canadien
Société de gestion collective de publicité directe télévisuelle inc.

choices.en: Major League Baseball Collective of Canada, Inc.
choices.fr: Société de perception de la ligue de baseball majeure du Canada, inc.
Ré:Sonne - Société de gestion de la musique

choices.en: Society of Composers, Authors and Music Publishers of Canada
choices.fr: Société canadienne des auteurs, compositeurs et éditeurs de musique

choices.en: Société de gestion collective des droits des producteurs de phonogrammes et vidéogrammes du Québec
choices.fr: Société de gestion collective des droits des producteurs de phonogrammes et vidéogrammes du Québec

choices.en: Société québécoise de gestion collective des droits de reproduction
choices.fr: Société québécoise de gestion collective des droits de reproduction

properties.titleEn: On behalf of which Collective Society are you filing the proposed tariff(s)?
properties.titleFr: [fr] On behalf of which Collective Society are you filing the proposed tariff(s)?

properties.descriptionEn: You can add another representative, up to three, by clicking 'add row' below.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] - You can add another representative, up to three, by clicking 'add row' below.

properties.descriptionEn: Please provide the long title of the proposed tariff.
properties.descriptionFr: [fr] - Please provide the long title of the proposed tariff.

properties.descriptionEn: A proposed tariff must be filed in both official languages. For more information on requirements for the filing of proposed tariffs, please refer to the [Practice Notice](https://cb-cda.gc.ca/sites/default/files/inline-files/PN%202019-004.pdf).
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] -A proposed tariff must be filed in both official languages. For more information on requirements for the filing of  proposed tariffs, please refer to the [Practice Notice](https://cb-cda.gc.ca/sites/default/files/inline-files/PN%202019-004.pdf).

properties.descriptionEn: Please attach the English Version. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] Please attach the English Version. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.

properties.descriptionEn: Please attach the French Version. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] Please attach the French Version. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.

properties.descriptionEn: Please enter the name of the previously approved or last-proposed tariff which covers the same, or substantially same, activities as the proposed tariff being filed. A comparative document does not have to be provided where the differences between the documents are so significant as to make the comparison incomprehensible, in this situation enter N/A.
properties.descriptionFr: [fr] - Please enter the name of the previously approved or last-proposed tariff which covers the same, or substantially same, activities as the proposed tariff being filed. A comparative document does not have to be provided where the differences between the documents are so significant as to make the comparison incomprehensible, in this situation enter N/A.

properties.descriptionEn: The Board requires an English blackline (redline) version that shows the changes from the previously approved or last-proposed tariff identified above to the newly proposed tariff. Attach the English comparative (blackline) version here. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] - The Board requires an English blackline (redline) version that shows the changes from the previously approved or last-proposed tariff identified above to the newly proposed tariff. Attach the English comparative (blackline) version here. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.

properties.descriptionEn: The Board requires an French blackline (redline) version that shows the changes from the previously approved or last-proposed tariff identified above to the newly proposed tariff. Attach the French comparative (blackline) version here. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] - The Board requires an French blackline (redline) version that shows the changes from the previously approved or last-proposed tariff identified above to the newly proposed tariff. Attach the French comparative (blackline) version here. You can upload .docx, .doc, and .pdf files.

properties.descriptionEn: Please provide any additional comments, information, or context.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] - Please provide any additional comments, information, or context.

properties.descriptionEn: Do you have another proposed tariff for the same collective(s)? If so, you can file it by clicking ‘add row’ below. If not, please press submit and you will be brought to the confirmation.
properties.descriptionFr: [FR] - Do you have another proposed tariff for the same collective(s)? If so, you can file it by clicking ‘add row’ below. If not, please press submit and you will be brought to the confirmation.

brand.name: cb-cda
brand.logoTitleFr: Commission du droit d'auteur du Canada
